source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Master Excel Keyboard Shortcuts & Mouse-Free Navigation
items.headline: Exponentially improve productivity by mastering Excel keyboard shortcuts in this advanced online course.
objectives_summary: Become competent using Excel keyboard shortcuts
Navigate all menus of Excel without using the mouse
Dramatically increase productivity & speed in executing Excel functions

items.title: Excel Data Analysis with Excel Pivot Tables, Excel Dashboard
items.headline: Excel Data Analysis and Excel Data Visualization with Excel Pivot Tables, Formulas, Pivot Charts and Excel Dashboard
objectives_summary: You will learn about Pivot Tables and Pivot Charts
You will learn to create 2 interactive Excel Dashboards
You will learn how to use 20 Plus  different Excel Charts and Graphs used in Dynamic Excel Dashboards.

items.title: [Azure] AZ-900 Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Exam Quick Prep
items.headline: [AZ-900] PDF Included, AZ-900, Earn Azure - 900 Certificate in 1st Attempt, Azure Practice Ques Included,  [Azure] 2021
objectives_summary: Full of hands-on instructions, interesting and illustrative examples, clear explanations
Prepare for Microsoft AZ-900 Azure Certification Exam
Earn the Microsoft Certified Azure Fundamentals Certificate

items.title: Microsoft Excel Line and Pie Graph Design and Styling
items.headline: Visualize data using vibrant charts and graphs! I'll teach you proper construction and styling using simple functions
objectives_summary: Line graph creation
Data inputting
Inserting titles, axes labels and legends

items.title: These 5 Excel Tricks Will Save Your Job
items.headline: Want to work with Excel like a pro? Improve your job performance with the Top 5 best practice Excel tricks.
objectives_summary: Know the 5 Top Excel tricks professionals use every day
Learn the standard way to gather information automatically
Learn the basics about summing up and comparing data from different tables

items.title: Master Microsoft Outlook 2010 the Easy Way
items.headline: Learn how to use this popular email and contact management application to become more productive.
objectives_summary: General overview of Microsoft Outlook 2010.
Customize the Quick Access Toolbar and the Ribbon.
Learn how to change views and personalize appearance.

items.title: Microsoft Access 365: Access VBA & Automating Outlook Email
items.headline: Learn more about Microsoft Access VBA and using VBA to send Outlook emails from within Microsoft Access!
objectives_summary: Create an Access Visual Basic Program that will use a one line command to Email a Report as an Attachment
Understand how to user VBA to open and control the Microsoft Outlook email program and send emails to multiple recipients.
MANY time saving VBA techniques, not just those used with Email, are explained in detail.

items.title: HR and Employee Dashboard using MS Excel

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn Investment Banking the easy way!
visible_instructors.title: Institute of Investment Banking
visible_instructors.name: Institute of Investment

items.headline: Learn to create HR Dashboard and explore powerful analysis for HR data
objectives_summary: Learn index designing and tab designing supported with interactive charts and graphs
Learn how to create and use Pivot table and charts effectively to arrange and analyze your data.

items.title: Microsoft Office 365 Administration
items.headline: Microsoft Office 365 Administration
objectives_summary: Setup a custom domain on on microsoft
Understand the basics of the integrated applications
Check service health

items.title: SharePoint Online part 1 Sites, Lists and Libraries
items.headline: Learn the basic handlings inside SharePoint Online in the cloud
objectives_summary: use the basic features of SharePoint Online
Create subsites, lists, document libraries ...
Know and use content types, site columns

items.title: Microsoft Project: Get Promotions, Respect and Mastery!
items.headline: Learn MS Project  - Newbie to EXPERT level! APPROVED by PMI for 5 PDU Points CAT 'B'. FREE DOWNLOAD 50+ exercise files
objectives_summary: Create expert-level Project plans using Microsoft Project 2013
Manage Resources like a Pro! Identify Overallocations - and learn multiple ways provided by Project 2013 to resolve
Manage all your Resources inside Project 2013 - whether it is people, money, machinery, licenses or even shared resources

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Data Analysis with Excel Pivot Tables
items.headline: Master Advanced MS Excel topics - Excel Formulas, Excel Formatting, Excel Pivot Tables, Excel Dashboard & Data Analysis
objectives_summary: You will learn to create 6 Dynamic Excel Dashboard
You will learn about Pivot Tables and Pivot Chart
You will learn how to Design, Format and Style Data Elements

items.title: Advanced Microsoft Word VBA Macro Programming
items.headline: Excel VBA macro programming isn't all there is to VBA. Take a deep dive into Microsoft Word automation.
objectives_summary: You will gain a deeper understanding of the how to use VBA to control the key elements of both the Word and VBA object models.
You will become familiar with the programmatic representation of Word's key textual components: paragraphs, sentences, words, characters...
You will learn how to programmatically create and modify long and complex documents containing multiple sections with different headers and footers.

items.title: Excel Automation: Learn VBA & Macros From Scratch!

items.headline: Learn how to use VBA, to build your own custom Automations in Excel|Simple most language used for Absolute Beginners
objectives_summary: Learn the Fundamentals of coding, to be able to Understand, Read & Write your own codes
Learn the Combined use of Writing & Recording to build full fledged Automations of your own

items.headline: Learn to master Power Pivot for Excel and DAX. This bundle includes three courses: Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will master Power Pivot for Excel.
You will learn how to create simple models in Power Pivot, loading data from different data sources.
You will learn how to write DAX expressions performing calculations such as Ratio-to-Parent, Year-to-Date, Year-Over-Year and so on.

items.title: Excel for beginners:( PowerPivot, PowerQuery,Macros,VBA,DAX)
items.headline: Learn to Create spreadsheets , Formulas ,Functions,Tables ,Charts and input data
objectives_summary: Enter data in a spreadsheet
Save and open spreadsheet
Create formulas and functions
